content: Hi! I was wondering if I would be able to see why I failed/got errors for some of the autograder test cases for pset 2. I passed all of the cases in the student tester, but I did not pass some tests with the same names in the autograder, so I wanted to see what happened.
subject: Seeing Pset 2 Autograder Detailed Results

content: If you click the "Autograder" link from the scores page you will see all the staff test cases that your code ran with.

Hi Ana, I saw that page earlier, but would I be able to know what exactly happened to cause the code to fail/give an error, so that I can hopefully avoid similar mistakes in the future?

For example, I saw that I didn't pass this autograder test case: 

but I passed the student tester test_play_game_wildcard case, and I was wondering if those are the same.
I don't have time to take a look through your code, but definitely head to office hours and someone there can let you know details on the test case and where your code went wrong.
